Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma is the top run-getter in the tournament with 593 runs
Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 152 against England in the tournament opener
Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav have been as lethal as they ever have been
Mohammed Shami and Mohammed Siraj who have been unplayable when on song
Pre-Game Insights: India head into the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 semi-final on the back of a perfect record from the league stage
India will be wary of the threat the stubborn New Zealand possess
The past record is just a shiny antique in a showcase and the hosts will have to be at their gun-slinging best when they face familiar foes New Zealand
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played on November 15, 2023, at Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai
The teams batting second at this venue have invariably lost early wickets in clusters under lights with the new ball moving dangerously in the air and off the deck
Others: Captain Rohit and coach Rahul Dravid will have to keep their outfit calm, nestled away from the fear of failure in a crunch match
Both India and New Zealand have bowlers who can inflict severe damage with the new ball
In this World Cup, no other bowling attack has produced a masterclass in bowling on flat wickets than India's
The young Rachin Ravindra is the find of the tournament for New Zealand
Captain Kane Williamson and Daryl Mitchell are the middle-order lynchpins for New Zealand but New Zealand do not match Indiaâ€™s firepower on paper
